Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionInterface, java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionInterface, java.lang.Runnable
Class that represents the Connection client side, Exchange Messages(receive and send) with the server, handle also the ping task
Since:
2020/06/19

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConnection

      public ClientConnection​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, int port, ClientGameController clientController)
      Public Constructor for ClientConnection
      Parameters:
      name - NickName used by the Client in a Game
      address - IP of the Server
      port - Port used by the Server
      clientController - ClientGameController of the Client (could be CLI or GUI)
